subject: Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
Cycling, Road
lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador seems to have a comfortable lead as the Vuelta a España winds toward the finish. But whatever the outcome, the race has strengthened his popularity despite his recent doping ban.
snippet: Alberto Contador seems to have a comfortable lead as the Vuelta a España winds toward the finish. But whatever the outcome, the race has strengthened his popularity despite his recent doping ban.
